=Bugzilla Conventions=
 
Below are the conventions used by the Epsilon developers to characterise reporting bugs according to their status.
 
* New bug: Status -> New
* Assigned bug: Status -> Assigned
* Bug fixed in the SVN: Status -> Resolved/Fixed, Whiteboard -> svn
* Bug fixed in an interim version: Status -> Resolved/Fixed, Whiteboard -> interim (the latter is optional)
* Bug fixed in a stable version: Statis -> Closed/Fixed
